title: Te Papa Cafe
subText: Rest and recharge at one of our cafes, then browse our shops for the perfect gift or souvenir.
when: Open 9am–6pm, every day of the year

paragraph.title: NULL
paragraph.text: Our ground-floor cafe offers great breakfasts, brunches, lunches, and fresh snacks. Gluten-free and vegetarian options are available. Drinks include espresso coffee, herbal teas, wine, and beer. Our kids’ play area will entertain your little ones while you rest your feet. A parents’ room is also available.

paragraph.title: NULL
paragraph.text: Bush City is just outside – great for exploring in fine weather.
